#include<stdio.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
int read_int()
{
	char c;
	while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
	int ret = 0;
	while(c>='0' && c<='9')
	{
		ret = ret*10 + c -48;
		c = gc();
	}
	return ret;
}
int main()
{
	int t,i,j,k,n,q,n1,n2,count = 0;
	
	n = read_int();
	q = read_int();	
	int* a = new int[n];
	
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	a[i] = read_int();
	
	for(i = 0 ; i < q; i++)
	{
		count = 0;
		n1 = read_int();
		n2 = read_int();
		n1--; n2--;
		bool ar[100000] = {0};
		for(j = n1 ;j <=n2;j++)
		{
			if(ar[a[j] -1] == 0 )
			{
				count++;
				ar[a[j]- 1] = 1;
			}
			
		}
		
		printf("%d\n",count);
	}

}
